keystone.name: Electrocute
keystone.description: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

keystone.name: Predator
keystone.description: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of MS and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus adaptive damage.
keystone.comments: Predator gives you a big boost of out-of-combat MS for 15 seconds. This is very useful for traversing between lanes or getting back to the fight earlier. The cooldown is affected by Ingenious Hunter, and can be reduced to around 45 seconds.

keystone.name: Dark Harvest
keystone.description: Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Touch souls to absorb them and deal bonus adaptive damage on your next attack based on total souls collected.

slot-1.name: Cheap Shot
slot-1.description: Deal bonus true damage to enemies with impaired movement or actions.

slot-1.name: Taste of Blood
slot-1.description: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

slot-1.name: Sudden Impact
slot-1.description: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
